While the shop is in Build Editing Mode, clicking on items will add them to the currently selected build category, or if they are already present in that category, remove them. You can add multiple categories with custom names and descriptions, and resize them as desired.

You can also right click on items to remove them from the build or add comments from the build author.

Citadel_Library_Description:
By playing matches, you will earn chapter keys that you can use here to you can explore tales in the world of Deadlock.

For now, only one book is available: The Binding of Oathkeeper. In time, each hero will have their own story that you will be able to shape - allowing you to put your own fingerprint on the world.
Citadel_Library_Future_Desc: At this point in Friends and Family, the choices you make only impact the narrative itself.  However the long term goal is to make the choices you make tangible in a regular match; either by unique voice lines, cosmetic options, or a combination of the two.

Citadel_StartMatchmaking_PlayerBannedFro: A player in this party is currently banned from playing in this mode.

Citadel_StartMatchmaking_RankedLockedPlu: Play {i:games_needed_to_unlock_ranked} more casual multiplayer games to unlock ranked multiplayer.

Citadel_StartMatchmaking_TooManyPlayers: There are too many players in this party to enter match making in this mode

HeroTraining_Intro_Desc: Here you'll be able to test out your hero's movement and abilities. Mastering these concepts is key to completing the ritual.
HeroTraining_Outro_Desc: You've grasped the fundementals; now prepare yourself for lane training.
HeroesPageActionText: Select a hero to view details
ItemHistory_Action_AssassinMinigameDrop: Earned by participating in the Nemesis Assassins event
ItemHistory_Action_CrossGameAchievement: Earned from unlocking an achievement in a different game
ItemHistory_Action_DiretideReward: Received a reward during the Diretide event
ItemHistory_Action_GSCreate: Granted by the game server you were playing on

ItemHistory_Action_Market_Remove: Listed on the Steam Community Market

LaneTraining_Intro_Desc:
The goal of the early game is to gain power so you can take objectives.

When you complete the goals listed on the right, we'll give you power unimaginable so you can take down the Guardian.
LeaveMatchPrompt_Text: You will not be able to rejoin once you leave.
ModIconTooltip_UnlockAllTier1: Unlocked after your team destroys all enemy Guardians
ModIconTooltip_UnlockAllTier2: Unlocked after your team destroys all enemy Walkers
ModIconTooltip_UnlockGenerators: Unlocked after your team destroys an enemy Shrine
ModIconTooltip_UnlockGuardians: Unlocked after your team destroys a set of enemy Base Guardians
ModIconTooltip_UnlockTier2: Unlocked after your team destroys two enemy Walkers
ModIconTooltip_UnlockTier3: Unlocked after your team destroys the enemy Patron's first form
MoveWhileShootingSpeedPenaltyReductionPe: Movement speed penalty while shooting reduction
MyRosterExitRosterConfirm: Are you sure you want to exit the roster? This will exit the roster for your entire party.
MyRosterNoHeroDesc: You will be assigned one of these heroes to play when you enter the match.
MyRosterPartyHighSkillRange: Your party contains a wide skill range of players. This will result in a MORE DIFFICULT match for your party.
MyRosterRosterDesc: In order to enter Matchmaking, you’ll need to add at least 3 Heroes to your Roster.
MyRoster_PreferHeroes: Star a hero to prefer them for the next match.
MyRoster_SelectHeroes: Select Heroes to add or remove them from your Roster.
NPE_Bots_Modal_Desc:
Your first bot match!

Bot matches are great for gaining familiarity with a hero; but don't accurately recreate the flow and teamwork of a PvP match.

Once you feel comfortable, feel free to leave the bot match and hop into matchmaking.
NPE_Heroes_Modal_Desc:
Looks like this is your first time playing!

We've highlighted a few Heroes that are great for New Players. We recommend trying out one of these if you're uncertain about where to start.
NewPlayer_HeroSandbox: Try out your moves in Hero Training
NewPlayer_LaneTraining: Learn the early game in Lane Training
NewPlayer_NewPlayerFlow_Desc: To get started, check out the tasks within Learn.
NewPlayer_YouAreFinished: You're ready! Try a bot match within Practice or Play your first game!
RarityTypeDesc: %s1 %s2				// s1 is the rarity, s2 is the item type
ReloadBullet_label: Applying an ionizing charge automatically reloads 1 bullet
ReportCard_DamageTaken_Desc: For incoming damage, less is more
ReportCard_GuardianDamage_Desc: Damage you’ve dealt to enemy objectives
ReportCard_KillGuardian_Desc: Take down anyone who stands in your way to victory!
ReportCard_LastHits_Desc: Achieve the last hit on Troopers and Enemy Heroes.
ReportCard_ModsPurchased_Desc: Buy an item at the Shop
ReportCard_NetWorth_Desc: Souls gained by killing troopers and shooting orbs
ReportCard_OrbsDeniedDesc: Steal an Orange orb from an enemy's kill by shooting it
ReportCard_OrbsSecuredDesc: Secure a Green orb by shooting it in the air
ReportCard_OrbsSecured_Desc: Shoot Blue Souls from felled enemies and Orange Souls stolen from your opponents.
ReportCard_PlayerDamage_Desc: Damage you’ve dealt to enemy heroes
ReportCard_PowerUp_Desc: Ride the Transit Line back to base and spend all your Souls and Ability Points
ReportCard_SoulsCollected_Desc: Collect 1000 souls from killing enemy troopers
SafeToAbandon_Text: This match is now safe to abandon without penalty.
Sandbox_Tutorial_Abilities_desc: Try using your Abilities by pressing [{s:in_ability1}], [{s:in_ability2}], [{s:in_ability3}] or [{s:in_ability4}].
Sandbox_Tutorial_Completed_desc: Feel free to play around more. When you’re done, leave Sandbox and start Lane Training.
Sandbox_Tutorial_Mods_desc: Go to the Shop to browse items. Try purchasing a few.
Sandbox_Tutorial_Movement_desc: Use this area to test out your controls.
Sandbox_Tutorial_Upgrades_desc: Hold [{s:show_scoreboard}] to spend Ability Points to upgrade your Abilities.
Sandbox_Tutorial_Zipline_desc: Hold {s:in_mantle} to get on the Transit Line. You can jump off by pressing {s:in_mantle}.
SecondHit_label: Double Strike a random hero in range.
SelectHeroFromRoster: Select a hero from your roster to play
SoloBotMatchActionText: Select a hero to play as in the bot match
SpawnTroopers_label: Spawn a melee trooper for each enemy hero trapped in the cage
ability_afterburn_desc: Your bullets build up to apply a burning effect on enemies. Infernus's bullets and abilities will refresh the duration.
ability_afterburn_quip: Shoot enemies to set them on fire
ability_afterburn_t1_desc: Victims deal -30% Spirit Damage.
ability_astro_rifle_desc: Equip a Rifle that deals spirit damage to hit Heroes and gives {s:hero_name} a stacking damage bonus against them.
ability_astro_rifle_t1_desc: Applies a {s:SlowPercent}% slow on hit. Lasts {s:SlowDurationPerStack}s per stack
ability_astro_shotgun_toggle_desc:
Use to toggle between your pistol and shotgun. The shotgun so powerful it forces {s:hero_name} to move the opposite direction of the shot while airborn. [{s:iv_attack}] shoots forward and [{s:iv_attack2}] shoots behind you with a slight delay. The shotgun uses special bullets that does not benefit from ammo mods.

Lassoed units do not take damage when shooting backwards.
ability_blood_bomb_desc:
Sacrifice some of your health to launch a bomb that deals damage after a brief arm time.
Self damage type is Spirit and can be mitigated.
ability_blood_bomb_quip: Sacrifice some health to launch a damaging bomb
ability_blood_bomb_t3_desc: Bombs leave a toxic mess on the ground, dealing 26% of the original damage per second, for 6s.
ability_blood_shards_desc: Sacrifice some of your health to launch blood shards that apply a stack of Malice. Each stack slows the victim and increases the damage they take from you. The slow effect decreases over time.
ability_blood_shards_quip: Stack damage amplification on an enemy
ability_bounce_pad_desc: Drop a bounce pad in the world that sends you and other heroes flying. You will stomp down on landing, dealing damage to any nearby enemies.
ability_bounce_pad_t1_desc: You and allies gain a +4m/s movement speed bonus for 4s on landing
ability_bounce_pad_t2_desc: +100 Stomp Damage with improved scaling
ability_bullet_flurry_desc: Enter a flurry, firing your weapon at nearby enemies with perfect accuracy. During the flurry, Haze gains a fire rate bonus and will evade some of the bullets shot at her.
ability_bullet_flurry_quip: Unleash a flurry of bullets around you
ability_burrow_desc: Burrow underground, moving faster, and gaining spirit and bullet armor. Damage from enemy heroes will reduce the speed bonus. When you jump out, knock enemies into the air and perform a spin attack that damages and slows. Cooldown starts when Burrow ends.
ability_burrow_quip: Travel underground, emerging with spin damage
ability_burrow_t2_desc: +140 Spin DPS and +2 radius
ability_burrow_t3_desc: -19.0 Cooldown and +2m/s Move Speed
ability_carpetbomb_drone_desc: Summon a drone that drops bombs as it flies. The Drone moves towards the aimed direction. Drone explodes in to a cluster of bombs when it expires
ability_carpetbomb_drone_t2_desc: Ability Cooldown {s:AbilityCooldown}s and Drone Health +{s:DroneHealth}
ability_carpetbomb_drone_t3_desc: Bomb drop interval {s:AttackRate}s and Drone speed +{s:DroneSpeed}
ability_charged_shot_desc: Charge up a powerful shot that pierces through enemies. Hold 1 or {{Mouse|1}} to hold the shot.
ability_charged_shot_quip: Charge up a long range shot
ability_charged_shot_t3_desc: Improved damage scaling and -3s Charge Delay
ability_death_tax_desc: Enemies injured by Lady Geist are marked with Death Tax. Whenever a marked enemy dies, {s:hero_name} gains health.
ability_death_tax_t1_desc: Reduce one of your Cooldowns by {s:CooldownReductionOnKill}s when a marked enemy dies
ability_death_tax_t3_desc: Increase Spirit Power by {s:TechPowerAmpBonus} for {s:TechPowerAmpBonusDuration}s when a marked enemy dies. Stacks up to {s:TechPowerAmpBonusMaxStacks} times.
ability_explosive_barrel_desc: Place a barrel that explodes when shot, or on landing after launched via melee attack or bounce pad. Has a minimum arm time before it can explode.
ability_explosive_barrel_quip: Throw a barrel that explodes when shot
ability_explosive_trap_desc: A bomb that launches everything it hits up in the air. Manually detonate by pressing [1] after arming. Useful for mobility.
ability_explosive_trap_t1_desc: ArmTime decreased by {s:ArmTime} and Blast Force +{s:Force}
ability_explosive_trap_t3_desc: Bomb throw range +{s:ProjectileSpeedBonus}% and damage +{s:Damage}
ability_fire_bomb_desc: Turns you into a living bomb that explodes after a short delay, stunning all enemies in its radius.
ability_fire_bomb_quip: Stun all nearby enemies after a short delay
ability_fire_bomb_t2_desc: +0.5s Stun Duration and +4m Radius
ability_fire_bomb_t3_desc: +115 Damage and 100% lifesteal from enemy heroes hit
ability_flame_dash_desc:
Move forward at high speed and leave a flame trail that burns enemies. Infernus gains 50% slow resistance for the duration.
Hold {{Mouse|1}} to dash faster.
ability_flame_dash_quip: Blaze forward, leaving a flame trail in your wake
ability_flame_dash_t1_desc: +30% Fire Rate Slow for 6s
ability_gravity_lasso_desc:
Grab an enemy with your lasso and drag them along behind you. The enemy is stunned and Astro is slowed slightly during the lasso.

Lasso duration is paused for 2s during the first usage of a bounce pad.
ability_gravity_lasso_quip: Grab an enemy and drag them behind you
ability_gravity_lasso_t3_desc: Can lasso another enemy inside targetting area
ability_guided_arrow_desc:
After 1.5s cast time, launch a spirit owl that you control and which explodes on impact, damaging and stunning enemies. Hold {{Mouse|1}} to accelerate the owl.
Press Space to release control. Gain permanent Spirit Power for each enemy hero killed with Guided Owl.
ability_guided_arrow_quip: Fly your owl to damage enemies from afar
ability_guided_arrow_t3_desc: After hit, kills enemies that are below 22% Health
ability_hat_trick_desc: Throws out her hat to strike enemies, slowing and revealing them through walls.
ability_hat_trick_quip: Throws her hat strike and reveal enemies
ability_head_stomp_desc: {s:hero_name} has more movement control while airborne and gains the ability to bounce off enemy heads after getting enough Air Speed.  Head Stomping an enemy will stun them.
ability_heal_drone_desc: Deploy a medic drone which slowly heals you and a nearby teammate."nReplaces any other drone.
ability_health_swap_desc: Swaps health levels with an enemy target. There is a minimum health percentage that enemies can be brought down to and a minimum amount of health received based on victims current health.
ability_health_swap_quip: Swap your current health with an enemy hero's
ability_health_swap_t3_desc: On cast, +40% Fire Rate and +40% Spirit Resist for 8s.
ability_heavy_drone_desc: Creates a helper drone that can be toggled between providing Healing, Speed or Rockets. Drones take a short time to activate after being switched.
ability_heavy_rage_desc: Passive - Increases Heavy's gun damage by {s:DamageMultiplierPercent}% each time it hits an enemy, up to {s:StacksPerEntity} stacks per enemy Hero and NPCs
ability_heavy_rage_t1_desc: Max stacks per enemy Hero or NPCs +{s:StacksPerEntity}
ability_heavy_rage_t3_desc: Gain {s:StacksOnTakeDamage} stacks when an enemy damages Heavy
ability_hijack_richochet_projectile_desc: Throws a dagger which bounces off walls and launches towards nearby enemies. Pierces and deals damage to any enemy units it hits. Damage increases after first bounce off wall.
ability_ice_dome_desc: Kelvin freezes the air around him, creating an impenetrable dome around himself. While in the dome, allies rapidly regenerate health and enemies are slowed.
ability_ice_dome_t3_desc: +70 Health Regen and now scales with Spirit Power
ability_ice_grenade_desc: Throw a grenade that explodes in a cloud of freezing ice, damaging and slowing enemies.
ability_ice_grenade_t2_desc: Frost Grenade now heals 145 HP to friendly targets. Scales with Spirit.
ability_icebeam_desc: Shoot freezing cold energy out in front of you, damaging targets and building up movement and fire rate slow against them the longer you sustain the beam on them. You have reduced movement speed while using Arctic Beam. The beam may also claim Souls.
ability_icebeam_t3_desc: Fires 2 additional Arctic Beams toward enemies within 13m of the last target hit
ability_icepath_desc:
Kelvin creates a floating trail of ice and snow that gives movement bonuses to him and his allies. Kelvin gains 60% slow resistance for the duration. Enemies can also walk on the floating trail.
Press Shift / Ctrl to travel up or down while in Ice Path.
ability_icepath_quip: Speed around on a floating path of ice
ability_icepath_t3_desc: While active, gain +1 Spirit Power per meter of Ice Path trail created.  Max of 55 Spirit Power
ability_immobilize_trap_desc: Throw out a trap that begins to arm itself. Once armed, the trap will trigger when an enemy enters its radius, immobilizing and then slowing them.
ability_immobilize_trap_quip: Place a trap that immobilizes enemies
ability_immobilize_trap_t3_desc: Grey Talon deals +30% more Bullet Damage to enemies hit by Immobilizing Trap for 10s
ability_incendiary_projectile_desc: Spew napalm that slows enemy movement and amplifies the damage Infernus does to them.
ability_incendiary_projectile_quip: Spew napalm that amplifies your damage
ability_incendiary_projectile_t2_desc: Infernus gains 15% Lifesteal against victims
ability_incendiary_projectile_t3_desc: +15% Damage Amplification and -40% Heal/Regen
ability_intimidate_desc: Deal damage to nearby enemies and heal yourself based on the damage done. Heal is stronger against enemy heroes.
ability_intimidate_quip: Damage enemies nearby, healing from each hit
ability_intimidate_t3_desc: Adds a debuff to enemies that lets Mo & Krill deal +15% Damage to them. Stacks and lasts 16s.
ability_kali_dust_storm_desc: Send out a tornado that damages enemies it touches, as well as applying a lingering movement and fire rate slow.
ability_kali_dust_storm_quip: Send out a tornado that slows enemies
ability_kali_tornado_blade_desc: Throw a blade that deals damage to everything around it. Press the skill's Ability key to stop Whirling Blade in place and to expand its size. Deals additional damage on expansion.
ability_kali_trappers_bolo_desc: Throw a bolo that bounces between enemy heroes before returning to you. Victims will slow down over {s:DebuffDelay}s and then become immobilized for {s:ImmobilizeDuration}s. Bounces once per hero.
ability_kali_trappers_bolo_t1_desc: Enemies hit by the bolo give {s:ReverseLifeLeech}% Lifesteal for {s:ReverseLifeLeechDuration}s
ability_lash_flog_desc: Strike enemies with your whip, stealing life from them.
ability_lash_flog_quip: Lifesteal from targets ahead of you
ability_lash_flog_t1_desc: Apply 35% Movement Slow for 3s
ability_lash_flog_t3_desc: +105 Damage and applies 35% Fire Rate Slow
ability_life_drain_desc: Create a tether that drains enemy health over time and heals you. Target must be in line of sight and within max range to drain. You can shoot and use other abilities during the drain, but your movement speed is reduced by half. Press 2 to cancel.
ability_life_drain_quip: Steal health from an enemy over time
ability_life_drain_t3_desc: Enemy is Silenced while being Life Drained (requires line of sight)
ability_mirv_grenade_buff_desc: Tempoarily turns {s:hero_name}'s primary weapon attack to explode in to a cluster of bombs.
ability_mirv_grenade_buff_t1_desc: Adds +{s:Grenades} bomb per cluster and +{s:AbilityDuration}s duration
ability_mirv_grenade_buff_t3_desc: Infinite Shots while Mad Bomber is active
ability_nano_pounce_desc: Leap at a target to inflict Light Melee damage. Targetting an enemy will cause slow on nearby enemies. Targeting an ally will have reduced Cooldown and Recharge times.
ability_nano_pounce_t2_desc: +30% Fire Rate Slow and +6m Slow Radius
ability_nano_pounce_t3_desc: +1 Ability Charge and reloads up to 25% of your ammo
ability_nano_proximity_ritual_desc:
Deploy Ava to focus on a nearby enemy. Targetted enemies have reduced healing and give health to Calico when damaged by any ally. Ava is only active when Calico is nearby.
While nearby Press [3] to recall Ava, Ava regains health while recalled.
ability_nano_proximity_ritual_quip: Deploy your companion to attack enemies
ability_nano_proximity_ritual_t2_desc: Victims receive UNKNOWN[FireRateSlow]% Fire Rate Slow and +UNKNOWN[ActiveRadius]m Active Radius
ability_nano_proximity_ritual_t3_desc: +35% Damage Amplification and -30% Heal Reduction on Victims.
ability_nano_ult_shadow_desc: Cast yourself in shadow and go Invisible. Attacks do not break invisibility but they will temporarily reveal you. Hitting enemies with Melee damage will reduce their bullet resist (stacking)
ability_nano_ult_shadow_t3_desc: Heavy Melee attacks cause Silence for 3s
ability_overcharge_desc: Temporarily boosts the effect of Heavy's current drone and increases his fire rate.
ability_perched_predator_desc:
Send a Spirit Cat forward that grab's targets in its way. Grabbing a Hero will cause an explosion soon after.
Press 1 to manually create the explosion.
ability_pounce_desc: {s:hero_name} leaps forward, creates an explosion on landing and damages enemies in an area.
ability_power_jump_desc:
Launches you high in the air, allowing you to glide slowly. While airborne, you gain Weapon Damage and multishot on your weapon.
Alt-Cast for reduced jump height.
Press Space to cancel the glide.
ability_power_jump_quip: Jump high up in the air and unleash multishots
ability_power_jump_t2_desc: While airborne, +5 Weapon Damage and weapon damage applies 40% movement slow for 1.5s
ability_power_jump_t3_desc: While airborne, +50% Bullet Lifesteal and +50% Spirit Lifesteal
ability_power_surge_desc: Power up your weapon with a shock effect, making your bullets proc shock damage on your target. This shock damage bounces to enemies near your target. Occurs once per burst shot.
ability_power_surge_quip: Create electric arcs with your shots
ability_power_surge_t1_desc: Shock Damage applies -15% Spirit Resist for 8s
ability_power_surge_t3_desc: +12 Shock Damage, improved Spirit scaling, and +3 Max Jumps
ability_propulsion_gel_desc: Fire a wave of propulsion gel that grants increased movement speed for allies. Unit's hit by the gel wave will be covered by gel and leave a trail behind them
ability_propulsion_gel_t1_desc: Gel reduces zoomed and shooting move speed penalty by {s:ShootingSpeedPenaltyReduction}% to friendly units
ability_rocket_drone_desc: Deploy a drone which shoots homing rockets at enemies at close range that slows enemies.
ability_rocket_drone_t1_desc: The Drone adds {s:ClipReloadPercentagePerSecond}% of max clip per second to Heavy's gun
ability_rocket_drone_t2_desc: The Drone applies health regen to Heavy and a nearby target for {s:DroneHealthRegen} health per second .
ability_scrap_blast_desc: Shoots out a blast of consumed remains, damaging and slowing enemies. Multiple hits increase the slow.
ability_scrap_blast_quip: Shoot a blast of bio mass
ability_self_purge_desc: Drags enemies towards heavy and causes an explosion.
ability_self_purge_t1_desc: Permanent Ammo +{s:ClipBonusOnHit} for every enemy Hero hit by the explosion
ability_sleep_dagger_desc: Throw a dagger that damages and sleeps the target. Sleeping targets wake up shortly after being damaged. Throwing a Dagger does not break your invisibility. Sleep Dagger does not interrupt enemies' channeling abilities.
ability_sleep_dagger_t3_desc: Applies -12% Bullet Resist for 6s on wake-up.
ability_slingshot_bruising_shot_desc: Hits damage the target, and stack bruises on them that increase all subsequent damage taken from Slingshot's weapon and abilities.
ability_slingshot_bruising_shot_t1_desc: +{s:BruiseFireRate}% fire rate per stack when shooting at a bruised enemy.
ability_slingshot_catapult_desc: Slingshots builds up power before launching himself forward as a large spinning ball, rolling around damaging enemies. Explodes on finish.
ability_slingshot_open_wounds_desc: Passive. Slingshot's bullets cause wounds to build up on the enemy, dealing a large burst of damage when enough hits are inflicted.
ability_slingshot_open_wounds_t3_desc: Damage burst sprays poisonous blood nearby, damaging any enemies staying in the area.
ability_slingshot_ultimate_desc: All nearby enemies are knocked in the air and stunned for as long as Slingshot channels.
ability_smelt_desc: Every time Heavy takes damage from a bullet it goes into his weapon clip and reduces ability cooldowns.
ability_smoke_bomb_desc: Fade out of sight, becoming invisible and gaining sprint speed. Attacking removes invisibility. Close enemies can see through your invisibility.
ability_smoke_bomb_t3_desc: After invis, gain +30% Bullet Lifesteal for 8s
ability_speed_drone_desc: Deploy a energy drone which helps you run faster, and reduces your windup and reload times."nReplaces any other drone.
ability_stacking_damage_desc: Shooting a target increases your bullet damage on that target. Gain one stack per bullet hit, two if the hit is a headshot.
ability_stacking_damage_quip: Deal increasing bullet damage to a target
ability_stacking_damage_t1_desc: 60 Spirit damage and 15% slow for 2s to target every 20 stacks
ability_stacking_damage_t2_desc: +40 Max Stacks and +5s Duration
ability_target_practice_desc: On activate, your next gun hit selects an enemy Hero as a target. Shoot them {s:ShotsToProc} times to deal a burst of spirit damage. Every Headshot will increase the burst
ability_target_practice_quip: Focus shots on a target to gain an advantage
ability_target_practice_t3_desc: Your bullets reduce your target's Bullet Resist by {s:BulletArmorReduction}% for {s:DebuffDuration}s
ability_teammate_armor_buff_desc: Apply a temporary Bullet and Spirit barrier to a friendly unit or yourself.
ability_tempest_faraday_cage_desc: Target an enemy hero to trap them in a faraday cage, blocking movement and bullets.
ability_tempest_ion_dagger_desc: Tempest throws a dagger that damages the target and applies an ionizing charge to it for a duration. Tech damage dealt to that target is increased and a cleaves for a percentage of that damage to nearby targets. Ionizing a target multiple times increases the duration.
ability_tempest_tesla_coil_desc: Build a Tesla Coil that builds a charge on itself then discharges on the closest enemy within range. Holds the charge and builds overcharge if no enemies are in range. When Tempest fights in range of the coil, his gun is amp'd and his bullets deal bonus spirit damage.
ability_tempest_weathermaker_desc: A ray of sun shines on each enemy hero anywhere on the map. Moments later, any enemy that did not find cover is struck by a powerful bolt of lightning, dealing damage to them and revealing them through walls for a duration. Can pass through Faraday Cage.
ability_throw_sand_desc: Spray sand that disarms enemies in front of you and deals damage.
ability_throw_sand_quip: Disarm enemies in front of you
ability_uber_drone_desc: After a charge-up time, Heavy turns invulnerable
ability_uber_drone_t1_desc: While Ubered, infinite clip and no windup
ability_uber_drone_t3_desc: Gain +{s:RageOnUber} stacks of Heavy Rage
ability_ult_combo_desc: Hold the target in place, stunning them and dealing damage during the channel. If they die during Combo, you permanently gain max health.
ability_ult_combo_quip: Hold the enemy hero in place and pummel them
ability_ult_combo_t3_desc: +40 Damage Per Second and 100% lifesteal
ability_upgrade_description: You have unlocked a tier {s:upgradeTier} ability upgrade. Choose an upgrade from the list below.
ability_upgrade_extra_info: Ability upgrades are unlocked whenever you purchase two upgrades in any mod tier (Weapon, Armor, Tech or Utility).
ability_warden_crowd_control_desc: Throw a flask that damages, slows, and reduces the weapon damage and stamina of enemies it hits.
ability_warden_crowd_control_t3_desc: -6.5s Cooldown and applies 35% Fire Rate Slow
ability_warden_high_alert_desc: Gain a spirit shield and bonus movement speed.
ability_warden_high_alert_quip: Gain a spirit shield and movement speed
ability_warden_high_alert_t3_desc: +200 Spirit Shield Health and now scales with Spirit Power
ability_warden_lock_down_desc: Curse an enemy hero. If they don't move away from their initial position within the escape time, they will be damaged and immobilized.
ability_warden_lock_down_quip: Curse your target, rooting them if they don't escape
ability_warden_lock_down_t3_desc: Warden deals +20% more Bullet Damage to trapped Heroes for 6s
ability_warden_riot_protocol_desc:
After charging for 2.25s, release pulses that damage enemies and heal you based on the damage done.
While channeling Last Stand you have greatly increased bullet resist.
ability_warden_riot_protocol_quip: Emit pulses that steal health from enemies
ability_wrecker_salvage_desc: Stuns an enemy trooper or NPC, damaging them while held. A successful kill provides a fire rate bonus, and restores a Bio Blast charge. This bonus stacks independently
ability_wrecker_salvage_quip: Consume an enemy trooper or neutral
ability_wrecker_salvage_t1_desc: 150 health restored per kill.
ability_wrecker_teleport_desc: Launch a flying shadow copy of yourself that you control, teleporting your original body to wherever it lands. The teleport explosion slows enemies and deals damage based on how long you were flying.
ability_wrecker_teleport_quip: Launch a flying illusion of yourself, teleporting your real body where the illusion lands
ability_wrecker_ultimate_desc: Grabs any enemy looked at by Wrecker, putting them in stasis and holding them overhead. Stuns, and damages all captured enemies when finished. Any grabbed NPCs are salvaged.
ability_wrecking_ball_desc: Create a large ball of scrap that can be thrown, damaging and stunning anything it hits. The ball takes time to create and you move slower while carrying it.
ability_wrecking_ball_quip: Throw a ball of scrap that stuns enemies
akimbo_bulletshield_desc:
Creates a shield that protects {s:hero_name} from bullets and prevents bullet based procs. Bullet shield explodes when it expires.
Prevents
akimbo_chargedshot_desc: {s:hero_name} charges gun and deals Spirit Damage to nearby enemies in front.
akimbo_chargedshot_t3_desc: Reduces enemy bullet armor by {s:BulletArmorReduction} for {s:BulletArmorReductionDuration}s
akimbo_rocketman_desc: {s:hero_name} transforms into a grenade that stuns enemies.
akimbo_stealammo_desc: Force targets to reload. {s:hero_name} gains {s:StealTechPower}% Spirit Power per target.
apocalypse_armageddon_desc: A pool of light marks a safe zone surrounding {s:hero_name} as meteors fall from the sky in a wide radius around the safe zone. Meteors damage allies as well as enemies, but damage to allies is reduced and non-lethal.
apocalypse_discharge_soul_desc: Fires a projectile that damages, EMPs, and slows. Charges do not refresh with time. Collect charges by kneeling next to tombstones that appear near fallen friendly troopers.
apocalypse_four_horsemen_desc: Summon four hologram horsemen who stampede in a straight line, damaging enemies they pass through and leaving a trail that slows and damages enemies.
apocalypse_gigantic_sword_desc: {s:hero_name}'s staff turns into a gigantic sword. When active, Apocalypse's melee attack deal extra damage and cover extra range.
cadence_ability_anthem_desc: Burst into an inspiring song! You and any ally that comes within range get an instant reload with an extra large clip, and have a Fire Rate bonus that increases until the song ends.
cadence_ability_anthem_quip: Lead the charge, inspiring allies in earshot and giving them weapon buffs
cadence_ability_crescendo_desc: Encase nearby enemies in glass in an increasing range over a short duration. Cadence then breaks the glass with her powerful voice, breaking any shields on the them, damaging them, and giving them massive bullet vulnerability for a duraiton after.
cadence_ability_crescendo_quip: Encase enemies in glass then shatter it
cadence_ability_grandfinale_desc: Build high ground undernearth Cadence. Allies fighting from the high ground get a fire rate bonus and explosive bullets.
cadence_ability_grandfinale_quip: Build a stage, then fight from it with weapon buffs.
cadence_ability_lullaby_desc: Lull your foes to sleep! Any enemy that comes in range of Cadence sleeps until woken by damage, Cadence goes out of range, or the song ends. Cadence has bonus regeneration while singing.
cadence_ability_lullaby_quip: Lull any foe you come within earshot of to sleep.
cadence_ability_silencecontraptions_desc: Disarm yourself perform a long-range dash melee attack. For the duration of the song, you remain disarmed and your melee abilities apply a debuff that disarms and EMP's enemy targets.
cadence_ability_silencecontraptions_quip: Start a melee brawl. No guns allowed.
citadel_ability_ballista_ammo_pack_desc:
Equips an ammo backpack, allowing rapid fire of heavy ballistic shells. Slows the user somewhat.

This can be cancelled by toggling off. Remaining shells will be lost.
citadel_ability_ballista_bullet_storm_de: Fires a shell into the air which explodes into a rain of shrapnel. Deals damage over time and slows.
citadel_ability_ballista_fusion_bomb_des: Plants a fused bomb that deals light damage every second, until it explodes after {s:Fuse}.
citadel_ability_ballista_mine_field_desc: Places a clister of proximity mines around the target area. Mines deal damage and slow their victims
citadel_ability_ballista_shell_shotgun_d:
Ballista wields a massive flak cannon, dealing damage and knocking back enemies in front of her.

Deals weapon damage
citadel_ability_bebop_laser_beam_desc: Charge up your laser to unleash a powerful torrent of energy that deals damage and slows enemies' movement and dashes. You have slow movement and turn rate for the duration. If activated in the air, you will hover while unleashing the beam.
citadel_ability_bebop_laser_beam_t3_desc: Hyper Beam heals Bebop for 100% of its damage on Heroes. 33% on non-hero
citadel_ability_bull_charge_desc: Charge forward, colliding with enemies and dragging them along. Hitting a wall will Stun enemies caught by Abrams. Speed increased after colliding with enemy Heroes.
citadel_ability_bull_charge_quip: Charge into the fray, dragging enemies along
citadel_ability_bull_charge_t3_desc: +5.5 Weapon Damage for 8s after colliding with an enemy
citadel_ability_bull_heal_desc: Drain health from enemies in front of you while they are in the radius.
citadel_ability_bull_heal_quip: Drain health from enemies in front of you
citadel_ability_bull_leap_desc:
Leap high into the air and choose a ground location to crash into. When you hit the ground, all enemies in the radius are damaged and stunned.
Press {{Mouse|1}} to crash down early.
citadel_ability_bull_leap_quip: Smash into enemies from above, stunning them
citadel_ability_bull_leap_t2_desc: Gain 100 Max HP and 15% Fire Rate per hero hit. Lasts 25s.
citadel_ability_bull_leap_t3_desc: On cast, become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm. Expires 3s after landing.
citadel_ability_card_toss_desc: Deal weapon damage to summon cards.  Activate to throw a card that flies towards the enemy or point under your crosshair.
citadel_ability_chain_lightning_t3_desc: Chain lightning can hit any enemies around the target.
citadel_ability_charged_tackle_desc: Build up power then enter a charge, dragging and damaging enemies in your path. Can be canceled early.
citadel_ability_charged_tackle_t2_desc: Gain a {s:TechShield}HP Spirit Shield for {s:TechShieldDuration}s when Charged Tackle ends.
citadel_ability_charged_tackle_t3_desc: Remove Prepare Time and {s:AbilityCooldown}s Ability Cooldown
citadel_ability_chrono_kinetic_carbine_d:
Start charging your weapon and gain increased movement speed once it's fully charged. Your next shot will release the energy, dealing spirit damage and applying a time stop to the enemy hit. The damage dealt is an amplification of your current weapon damage.

You can slow time on yourself by pressing {{Mouse|2}} while an empowered shot is available.
citadel_ability_chrono_kinetic_carbine_q: Charge up your weapon to deal high damage and timestop
citadel_ability_chrono_kinetic_carbine_t: +2s Speed Duration, 2s Charge Time
citadel_ability_chrono_pulse_grenade_des: Throw a grenade that begins pulsing when it lands. Each pulse applies damage, movement slow, and stacking damage amplification for Paradox against the victim.
citadel_ability_chrono_pulse_grenade_qui: Throw a grenade that pulses, dealing damage and slow
citadel_ability_chrono_pulse_grenade_t3_: +45 Pulse Damage and +2% Damage Amp per stack.
citadel_ability_chrono_sphere_desc: {s:hero_name} creates a Time Vortex that slows down the flow of time for enemies. Enemies are also Silenced while in the Vortex.
citadel_ability_chrono_sphere_t3_desc: On creation, the Time Vortex will pull all enemies in to its center.
citadel_ability_chrono_swap_desc: Fire a projectile that swaps your position with the target enemy hero. While the effect occurs, you gain spirit lifesteal and the enemy takes damage over time.
citadel_ability_chrono_swap_quip: Swap positions with an enemy hero
citadel_ability_chrono_time_wall_desc: Create a time warping wall that stops time for all enemy projectiles and bullets that touch it. Enemies that touch the wall will take damage as a percentage of their max health and be briefly slowed.
citadel_ability_chrono_time_wall_quip: Create a wall that greatly slows projectiles
citadel_ability_chrono_time_wall_t3_desc: Enemies that touch Time Wall will be Silenced for 3.0s
citadel_ability_converge_desc: Throw a grenade that quckly pulls enemies toward its center.
citadel_ability_defensive_fortress_desc: Summon a large defensive shield that blocks enemy bullets but lets you and your teammate shoot through it.
citadel_ability_drone_detecting_enemies_: Outlines all enemy players (including hidden enemies) infront of where the drone is currently looking at.
citadel_ability_drone_teleport_desc: Instant Cast: teleports Hijack below the drone after the cast delay.
citadel_ability_duo_arc_cannon_desc: Duo's drone sweeps its laser {s:SweepCount} times from the sky, dealing damage to anyone caught in its path.
citadel_ability_duo_arc_cannon_t1_desc: Burns ground, dealing {s:BurnDPS} dps for {s:BurnDuration}s
citadel_ability_duo_energy_link_desc:
A short range tether which heals your drone. Breaks if you walk out of range.

If targeting an enemy, deals damage instead.
citadel_ability_duo_energy_link_t3_desc: Applies damage and healing effects within {s:ZapDistance}m of target
citadel_ability_duo_fusion_scalpel_desc: Forms a link between you and your drone, dealing damage to enemies which touch it
citadel_ability_duo_fusion_scalpel_t3_de: Link with up to {s:MaxAllyLinks} nearby allies
citadel_ability_duo_grenade_desc: Throw a grenade that explodes after {s:ArmingDuration}s
citadel_ability_duo_order_attack_desc: Orders your drone to attack a specific target. It will chase the target as needed to shoot the target
citadel_ability_duo_order_follow_desc: Orders your drone to follow you. It will automatically attack anyone who shoots you, or anyone you shoot.
citadel_ability_duo_order_sentry_desc: Orders your drone to guard an area. It will automatically attack any nearby threats
citadel_ability_duo_summon_drone_t2_desc: Fire a barrage of rockets while in sentry mode
citadel_ability_duo_summon_drone_t3_desc: Immobilize targets in place in attack mode
citadel_ability_fissure_wall_desc:
Creates a wall that divides the terrain in half. On creation, the wall deals damage and applies slow to enemies nearby.
After casting, press {{Mouse|1}} or 3 to erupt the wall early.
citadel_ability_fissure_wall_quip: Conjure a wall to block your foes
citadel_ability_fissure_wall_t1_desc: Removes 1 stamina and amplifies McGinnis's damage by 25% on hit enemies for 7s
citadel_ability_fissure_wall_t3_desc: Adds a 1s Stun to enemies hit by Spectral Wall
citadel_ability_flying_strike_desc: Throw a grappling hook to reel yourself towards an enemy, damaging and slowing the target when you arrive.
citadel_ability_flying_strike_t3_desc: +6 Weapon Damage for 10s after striking the target
citadel_ability_grapplehook_desc: Launches out a hook, and pull {s:hero_name} towards the wall it hits.
citadel_ability_healing_slash_desc: Slash enemies in front of you, damaging them and slowing their fire rate. If any enemy heroes are hit, you heal.
citadel_ability_healing_slash_quip: Damage enemies nearby, healing on hit
citadel_ability_hijack_mind_control_desc: Changes the team of enemy NPC's in an area and gives them extra health and bonus weapon damage. {s:hero_name} and nearby allies gain half the gold bounty for each hacked unit.
citadel_ability_hijack_mind_control_t1_d: Hacked units deal an extra {s:UnitBonusDamagePercent}% damage
citadel_ability_hijack_mind_control_t3_2: Hacked units deal an extra {s:UnitBonusDamagePercent}% damage
citadel_ability_hijack_stacking_weapon_j: Your bullets charge up a Weapon Jammer on enemy heroes that will give them a percent chance to misfire (bullet does not fire and they damage themselves).
citadel_ability_hook_desc: Launch out a hook that grabs and reels in the first hero it hits and deals damage to enemies. Target will be placed where you are facing.
citadel_ability_hook_quip: Pull in a target to you
citadel_ability_hook_t1_desc: Bebop deals 30% more bullet damage against hooked enemies for 10s
citadel_ability_hornet_chain_desc: Throw a stake that tethers enemies to the location where the stake lands. Enemy movement is restricted to the length of the tether.
citadel_ability_hornet_chain_quip: Tether your enemies to the ground
citadel_ability_hornet_chain_t3_desc: Tethered enemies are also <span style="font-weight: bold;">disarmed<%s3>
citadel_ability_hornet_crit_stacking_buf: Landing a headshot temporarily increases your weapon damage, stacking up to {s:MaxStacks} times.
citadel_ability_hornet_crit_vulernabilit: Your shots have a chance to leave targets vulnerable, causing all bullets to crit them.  Headshots are guaranteed to apply this effect.
citadel_ability_hornet_explosive_headsho: Headshots you deal explode, dealing a percent of the damage to nearby enemies.
citadel_ability_hornet_leap_desc: Leap into the air and fly. While in flight your weapon deals bonus spirit damage.
citadel_ability_hornet_leap_quip: Take flight and empower your weapon
citadel_ability_hornet_leap_t1_desc: +50% base Ammo while flying
citadel_ability_hornet_mark_desc: Vindicta mark's an enemy. They are visible on the minimap for the duration, and Vindicta can detect them through walls.
citadel_ability_hornet_mark_t2_desc: When a marked enemy is killed, Vindicta immediately gains {s:ChargeForKill} Charge for Assassinate
citadel_ability_hornet_nest_desc: Deploys a nest which will deploy Vindicta drones that fly slowly forward, attacking all enemies.
citadel_ability_hornet_snipe_desc: Use your scoped rifle to fire a powerful shot over long distances. Deal only partial damage until fully charged after 1s of being scoped. Does bonus damage to enemies with less than 50% health remaining. Landing a killing blow on a player with Assassinate grants you bonus souls.
citadel_ability_hornet_snipe_quip: Snipe injured targets for massive damage
citadel_ability_hornet_sting_desc: Your crow familiar deals impact damage, reduces their bullet resist and applies a bleed that deals damage based on the target's current health.
citadel_ability_hornet_sting_quip: Make a target bleed over time
citadel_ability_hornet_sting_t1_desc: Crow Ricochets up to 2 times towards other enemies within 15m
citadel_ability_infinity_slash_desc: Become infused with Yamato's shadow soul. After an initial invincible transformation, your abilities are refreshed and are 60% faster, and you gain damage resists and immunity to negative status effects. You are unable to die in this mode.
citadel_ability_kali_disruptive_charge_d: Provides a large speed bonus to you and nearby allies. The speed bonus decays over time.
citadel_ability_kali_disruptive_charge_q: You and nearby allies move much faster
citadel_ability_kali_disruptive_charge_t: {s:LifestealPercent}% Damage Lifesteal for the duration of Pack Hunter
citadel_ability_kali_spinning_blade_desc: Throw a spinning blade that deals damage and returns to you.
citadel_ability_kali_spinning_blade_quip: Launch a boomerang that flies back
citadel_ability_kali_spinning_blade_t1_d: {s:SlowPercent}% slow for {s:SlowDuration}s on enemies hit
citadel_ability_kali_spinning_blade_t2_d: +{s:Damage} Damage and Occilioblade gains +100% more damage from spirit
citadel_ability_kali_spinning_blade_t3_d: {s:CooldownReductionOnHit}s Cooldown for each enemy hit by Occilioblade
citadel_ability_kineticcharge_desc: {s:hero_name} creates a shield which absorbs all incoming damage. After the duration expires or the shield is destroyed, explodes and returns the damage absorbed to all enemies around him.
citadel_ability_lash_desc: Pull yourself through the air toward a target. Using Grapple also resets your limit of air jumps and dashes.
citadel_ability_lash_down_strike_desc: Stomp the ground beneath you, damaging enemies in front of you. If you perform Ground Strike while airborne, you quickly dive towards the ground. Damage grows slower after 25m.
citadel_ability_lash_down_strike_quip: Slam down to the ground, damaging enemies
citadel_ability_lash_down_strike_t2_desc: Struck enemies are popped into the air and slowed by 50% for 3s
citadel_ability_lash_down_strike_t3_desc: Damage Per Meter +110% and improved scaling
citadel_ability_lash_high_explosive_desc: Lash starts charging his grenade; the longer the grenade is held before being thrown, the more damage it does. Press the button again to throw it a short distance in front of Lash, exploding on contact.
citadel_ability_lash_quip: Use your whip to pull yourself to an enemy
citadel_ability_lash_t2_desc: +20m Cast Range and gain +6 Weapon Damage for 10s
citadel_ability_lash_t3_desc: +20% Fire Rate to Weapon Bonus Buff
citadel_ability_lash_ultimate_desc:
Focus on enemies to connect whips to them. After channeling, connected enemies are lifted and stunned then slammed into the ground. Your victims and any enemies in the landing zone will be damaged and slowed.
Press {{Mouse|1}} to throw connected enemies early. Enemies that are not in line of sight or go out of range during the latch time will not be grabbed.
citadel_ability_lash_ultimate_quip: Lift enemies and smash them into the ground
citadel_ability_lightning_ball_desc: Shoot a ball of lightning that travels in a straight line. Does damage to all targets in its radius. Slows down when damaging enemies and stops if it hits the world.
citadel_ability_lightning_ball_quip: Launch a damaging ball of lightning
citadel_ability_mechaguy_defense_field_d: Fires defensive rockets at attackers, and build regeneration for every {s:RegenThreshold} damage taken
citadel_ability_mechaguy_double_edge_des: Deals {s:Damage} damage to both you and your target
citadel_ability_mechaguy_double_edge_t2_: Deals {s:DamageHealthPercent}% of your health as additional damage
citadel_ability_mechaguy_echo_desc: Afflicts a target with Echo. When the target takes damage, nearby enemies are slowed by {s:SlowPercent}% for {s:SlowDuration}s
citadel_ability_mechaguy_retaliate_desc: Charges a projectile for {s:AbilityDuration}s. Deals {s:Damage} + {s:DamageMultiplier}x damage taken while charging
citadel_ability_mobile_resupply_desc: Deploy a spirit that heals nearby units.
citadel_ability_mobile_resupply_t1_desc: +35% Fire Rate on units being healed by Medicinal Specter
citadel_ability_mortarsentry_desc: Deploy a Sentry infront of {s:hero_name} that periodically launches mortars at enemies in the target area. Deals reduced damage to boss types
citadel_ability_mortarsentry_t1_desc: Sentry health +{s:Health}Hp and Sentry Lifetime +{s:TurretLifetime}s
citadel_ability_nikuman_desc: While channelling, restore health over time to you and any allies nearby. Dashing does not break channel.
citadel_ability_nikuman_quip: Heal yourself and those around you
citadel_ability_nikuman_t1_desc: Gain +4m/s movespeed bonus for 8s if Aurora is fully channeled. Gain instantly with 5AP Upgrade.
citadel_ability_nikuman_t3_desc: Full move and ability use and additionaly heals +3.8% of Max Health per second
citadel_ability_passive_beefy_desc: Regenerate a portion of incoming damage over time.
citadel_ability_passive_beefy_quip: Regenerate some of the damage you receive
citadel_ability_pestilence_contaminate_d: Attacking targets with your weapon increases their Infection level and resets the duration.
citadel_ability_pestilence_drone_desc: {s:hero_name} creates a drone that attaches to enemies causing DOT.
citadel_ability_pestilence_infection_des: Your abilities and bullets apply an infection onto enemies. Each infection stack resets the time and multiplies the damage the enemy takes from the infection.
citadel_ability_phalanx_reflect_desc: Phalanx activates his energy shield, causing any enemy projectile, bullet or grenade hitting it to be reflected back toward the attacker. Knocks back any charging enemies. Bullet hits extend the parry time, and stun the shooter.
citadel_ability_phalanx_sword_strike_des: Phalanx strikes the ground hard, causing a shockwave that runs forward all that damages enemies and causes them to stumble. Does not cancel enemy abilities.
citadel_ability_poison_bullets_desc: Apply tranquilizer to your victim until they fall asleep. Sleeping victims cannot act and take damage when they wake up.
citadel_ability_power_slash_desc:
Channel to increase damage over 1.4 seconds, then release a fully-charged sword strike.
Press 1 or {{Mouse|1}} to trigger the strike early, dealing partial damage.
citadel_ability_power_slash_quip: Charge up an attack, dealing high damage on a full charge
citadel_ability_power_slash_t1_desc: Gain +60 Bullet Resist while channeling
citadel_ability_power_slash_t2_desc: Apply 40% movement slow for 3s
citadel_ability_projectmind_desc: Teleport to the targeted location.
citadel_ability_projectmind_t2_desc: Provides a 300 bullet shield for 8s on teleport. Shield amount scales with Spirit Power.
citadel_ability_psychic_daggers_desc: Telekinetically throw cards that hit random targets around you.
citadel_ability_psychic_daggers_t3_desc: Each card bounces once onto another enemy in range
citadel_ability_psychic_lift_desc: Lift an enemy hero into the air, stunning them for a short time. When the lift ends, the target receives Telekinesis damage.
citadel_ability_psychic_lift_quip: Lift an enemy, interrupting and silencing them
citadel_ability_psychic_lift_t3_desc: Telekinesis will target enemies in an area around Wraith
citadel_ability_psychic_pulse_desc: Sense enemies in front of you, revealing their position through walls to your team.  Card Trick can target enemies seen through walls
citadel_ability_reflect_shield_desc: Phalanx deploys a energy shield, causing any enemy projectile, bullet, or grenade hitting it to be reflected back toward the attacker and stun them.
citadel_ability_revenant_blast_desc: Unleash a blast of energy at your target
citadel_ability_revenant_energy_strike_d: Strike the targeted area with a massive burst of energy.
citadel_ability_revenant_infuse_weapon_d: Fire special rounds that make your target vulnerable to your energy-based abilities.  Drains energy while active.
citadel_ability_revenant_siphon_energy_d: Shock your target and steal their energy whenever you strike them with your gun.
citadel_ability_rocket_barrage_desc: Unleashes a volley of rockets that home in on a targeted location.
citadel_ability_running_decoy_desc: {s:hero_name} creates a temporary decoy that will run towards the target location and shoot at any nearby enemies.
citadel_ability_running_decoy_t1_desc: Move speed +{s:MoveSpeedMod} m/s while decoy is active
citadel_ability_running_decoy_t2_desc: Astro is healed {s:HealOnCloneDamage}% of the damage taken by the decoy
citadel_ability_self_vacuum_desc: Create a singularity in your hands that pulls in nearby enemies and damages them. Once it's finished, enemies get knocked into the air.
citadel_ability_self_vacuum_quip: Pull in and stun the enemy team
citadel_ability_self_vacuum_t3_desc: Singularity takes 3.8% of the enemies' max health each second.
citadel_ability_shield_toss_desc: {s:hero_name} tosses his shield with great force, causing it to bounce between enemies, damaging and stunning them.
citadel_ability_shieldedsentry_desc:
Deploy a Mini Turret that automatically shoots enemies. The turret expires after a limited lifetime.
Turrets gain 30% of McGinnis's max health and have 60% Spirit Resist. They deal reduced damage to troopers and objectives.
citadel_ability_shieldedsentry_t1_desc: +1 Ability Charge and turrets apply +25% Movement Slow
citadel_ability_shieldedsentry_t2_desc: +10m Attack Range and +10% turret fire rate
citadel_ability_shiv_dagger_desc: Throw a knife that damages and bleeds an enemy. Each additional hit adds a stack and refreshes the bleed duration, causing the bleed to increase per stack.
citadel_ability_shiv_dagger_max_rage_des: Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full knives will ricochet to another enemy and apply a slow to enemies they bleed.
citadel_ability_shiv_dagger_quip: Apply stacking bleed to the target
citadel_ability_shiv_dash_desc:
Perform a dash forward, damaging enemies along the path.

Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full an echo of Shiv retraces the dash path after a short delay, damaging enemies again.
citadel_ability_shiv_dash_quip: Dash ahead, damaging all enemies along the path
citadel_ability_shiv_dash_t3_desc: Reduce cooldown by 2s per enemy hero hit (1s for Non-Hero). Max -6s per Dash.
citadel_ability_shiv_defer_damage_desc: Take only a portion of incoming damage immediately and defer the rest to be taken over time. Activate to clear a portion of the deferred damage.
citadel_ability_shiv_defer_damage_max_ra: Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full the amount of damage deferred is increased.
citadel_ability_shiv_defer_damage_quip: Defer a portion of damage taken
citadel_ability_shiv_killing_blow_active: Activate to leap towards an enemy hero and instantly kill them if their health is below the kill threshold, otherwise deal 200 damage to them.
citadel_ability_shiv_killing_blow_passiv: Passive: Damaging enemies fills you with rage. While at full rage, Shiv gains increased damage and special properties on his other abilities.
citadel_ability_shiv_killing_blow_quip: Travel to a low health hero and instantly kill it
citadel_ability_shiv_killing_blow_t1_des: Gain +2 m/s move speed while at full rage.
citadel_ability_shiv_killing_blow_t2_des: +8% Enemy Health Threshold and +10% Full Rage Bonus Damage
citadel_ability_shiv_killing_blow_t3_des: Finishing off an enemy with Killing Blow resets its cooldown.
citadel_ability_shoryuken_desc: Lash performs a rising uppercut, knocking enemies in the air in front of him. Can be used while in the air.
citadel_ability_spade_draw_desc: Spade draws a card from her deck. This card can be played, or used to add an effect to Sleeve Toss
citadel_ability_spade_hat_trick_desc:
Spade throws her hat, striking enemies along its path. Deals additional damage with successive hits

Restores all charges when cooldown completes.
citadel_ability_spade_hat_trick_t1_desc: Reduce total cooldown by 1s per unit hit
citadel_ability_spade_misdirection_desc: Creates a barrier which deals damage when crossed.
citadel_ability_spade_play_desc:
Plays your current card, gaining bonuses depending on which card is drawn.

BUG: Play your card to show upgrades in the shop
citadel_ability_spade_puppeteer_desc:
Spade turns the target into a puppet, forcing them to shoot nearby allies. Control is reduced if no targets are in range.

Puppets take reduced damage while being controlled.
citadel_ability_spade_sleeve_toss_desc: Spade pulls dove from her sleeve and throws it into the air. It will follow Spade's crosshair until detonation.
citadel_ability_spade_sleight_of_hand_de: Stab a nearby enemy. If done from behind, heavily slows the target.
citadel_ability_spade_translocate_desc: Spade marks an enemy hero's position. After a short duration, they will be returned to that spot.
citadel_ability_spade_vanishing_act_desc: Disappear from the world, becoming invisible and damage immune. The first action taken while under the effect gains bonus damage.
citadel_ability_static_charge_desc:
Apply a charge to a target enemy hero. After a short duration, the static charge stuns and damages enemies within the radius.
Alt-Cast to cast on yourself.
citadel_ability_static_charge_quip: Apply a delayed area stun to an enemy hero
citadel_ability_sticky_bomb_desc:
Attach a Sticky Bomb to a nearby target that deals explosive damage after a short fuse time.
Gain +2.5% bomb damage for every enemy hero hit.
Hold {{Mouse|3}} to cast a Sticky Bomb on yourself.
citadel_ability_sticky_bomb_quip: Plant a bomb on an enemy
citadel_ability_sticky_bomb_t3_desc: On Attach, disarms the target for 3.5s
citadel_ability_stomp_desc: Release an energy pulse that knocks enemies up into the air.
citadel_ability_stomp_quip: Release a ground pulse that knocks enemies into the air
citadel_ability_stomp_t1_desc: Hit enemies are fire rate and movement slowed by 35% for 4s.
citadel_ability_stomp_t2_desc: Dynamo deals 30% more Weapon Damage to hit enemies for 8s
citadel_ability_storm_cloud_desc: Channel an expanding storm cloud around you that damages all enemies within its radius. Enemies do not take damage when they are out of line-of-sight. You have increased Bullet Resist during the channel.
citadel_ability_storm_cloud_quip: Fry all enemies in a large area
citadel_ability_storm_cloud_t1_desc: +35% Bullet Resist while channeling Storm Cloud
citadel_ability_storm_cloud_t2_desc: +7s Channel Time and +10m Radius
citadel_ability_surveillance_drone_camer: Switches Camera from Player to Drone
citadel_ability_surveillance_drone_crash: Crashes Drone into ground dealing AOE damage
citadel_ability_surveillance_drone_desc: Deploys a fragile Combat Drone which has unique abilities.
citadel_ability_surveillance_drone_playe: Switches Camera from Drone to Player
citadel_ability_surveillance_drone_t2_de: +{s:CrashImpactRadius} crash impact radius, +{s:DroneCrashDamage} drone crash damage
citadel_ability_tangotether_desc: Gain bonuses and automatically connect with a nearby ally to share them. Healing is replicated among all those connected. Connection requires line of sight. Press 2 to Lock on to a target
citadel_ability_tangotether_quip: Empower yourself and a nearby ally
citadel_ability_tengu_airlift_desc:
Take flight with an ally or a bomb. Drop your ally or bomb to cause a large explosion that causes movement slow. Ivy and ally gain a bullet shield when flying ends.
While lifted, your ally gains bullet resist but cannot attack and deals -50% damage. Air Drop has faster cast time when targeting an ally.
{{Mouse|1}} to accelerate flying speed.
{{Mouse|2}} to drop ally/bomb.
citadel_ability_tengu_airlift_quip: Death from Above!  Fly and drop a bomb (or ally) on enemies
citadel_ability_tengu_airlift_t1_desc: -20% Bullet Resist on enemies hit for 12s
citadel_ability_tengu_airlift_t2_desc: +300 Bullet Shield and +5m Explode Radius
citadel_ability_tengu_airlift_t3_desc: Applies Silence on enemies hit for +4.5s
citadel_ability_tengu_dragonsfire_desc: Take flight and breathe eldritch flame down on your enemies.  Gain Bullet Resist while flying.
citadel_ability_tengu_ghost_desc: Summon a tracking ghost that bounces randomly {s:Bounces} times to new targets after impact. Slows targets hit for 5 seconds.
citadel_ability_tengu_lightningcrash_des: Jump into the air and start flying for a short time. When you hit the ground you deal damage based on how long you flew, as well as gaining a regeneration boost. You can end your flight and dive early by pressing [{s:iv_attack}].
citadel_ability_tengu_stone_form_desc: Turn yourself into impervious stone and smash into the ground, stunning and damaging enemies nearby. Heals you for a percentage of your max health. You have some air control before falling.
citadel_ability_tengu_stone_form_quip: Turn into impervious stone and stun enemies nearby
citadel_ability_tengu_stone_form_t2_desc: +80 Damage and stuns for 0.5s.
citadel_ability_tengu_urn_desc: Summon a patch of choking vines that damages and slows enemies in its radius.
citadel_ability_tengu_urn_quip: Damage and slow enemies in the area
citadel_ability_tengu_urn_t3_desc: +50 DPS and +2m Radius
citadel_ability_time_bank_desc: {s:hero_name} activates a burst of accelerated time where they move, shoot and reload faster. When the burst ends, {s:hero_name} must save up time for a short period and is time slowed.
citadel_ability_time_bank_quip: Speed yourself up, then slow down briefly
citadel_ability_time_bomb_desc: {s:hero_name} throws a bomb that explodes if enemies are in its radius after its arm time. The explosion causes a quick time freeze and deals {s:SingleTargetMult}x more damage if it only hits a single target.
citadel_ability_time_bomb_t2_desc: Enemies hit by Time Bomb will have their bullet resist reduced by {s:BulletArmorReduction} for {s:BulletArmorReductionDuration}s
citadel_ability_time_bomb_t3_desc: +{s:Damage} Damage and Time Bomb gains +50% more damage from Spirit Power
citadel_ability_upgrade_tab_desc: {s:show_scoreboard}+[Ability Key] will upgrade your ability. These are additional binds.
citadel_ability_uppercut_desc: Deal Light Melee damage to nearby units and send them flying back, causing area damage where they land. Does not damage allies.
citadel_ability_uppercut_t2_desc: On Uppercut enemy Hero, gain fast spin-up time, 2x range, and +60% weapon damage for 12s
citadel_ability_uppercut_t3_desc: On Uppercut enemy Hero, set Hook cooldown to 0 and instantly +100% bullets to your current clip
citadel_ability_void_sphere_desc: Dynamo briefly disappears into the void and then reappears a short distance away. On reappearing, your weapon is reloaded and has a fire rate bonus for the next clip (Max 8s). Can be cast with {{Mouse|3}} to also bring nearby allies and give them half fire rate bonus.
citadel_ability_void_sphere_quip: Blink in and out of existence
citadel_ability_void_sphere_t3_desc: On reappearing, +120% base ammo
citadel_ability_wing_blast_desc: Create a blast of air that pushes enemies away and damages them.
citadel_ability_wraith_rapidfire_desc: Temporarily boosts your fire rate. Nearby allies receive half the fire rate bonus.
citadel_ability_zealot_energy_warp_desc: Teleports Zealot forward to a distant target. When the teleport is complete, a large burst of energy is released damaging and silencing enemies. Any tethered friendly will also be teleported along with Zealot.
citadel_ability_zealot_energy_warp_t3_de: Refresh Energy Warp cooldown upon killing any of the enemies EMPd by Energy Warp.
citadel_ability_zealot_inner_fire_desc: Passive. Zealot gains health, and grows in physical power while using his other abilities.
citadel_ability_zealot_inner_fire_t2_des: Damage Resist +{s:DamageReductionWhileSpirits}% while using Summon Spirits
citadel_ability_zealot_inner_fire_t3_des: Health Regen +{s:BonusHealthRegenWhileEnergyWarp} while using Energy Warp
citadel_ability_zealot_spirit_echo_desc: Shoots a echo spirit at a targeted enemy, slowing and dealing damage. Bounces to nearby enemy units, hitting each unit once.
citadel_ability_zealot_spirit_echo_t3_de: Echo slow now reduces Fire Rate {s:FireRateReduction}
citadel_ability_zealot_summon_spirits_de: Creates energy orbs that rotate around Zealot, striking and damaging anything in their path. Orbs can be shot forward, damaging enemies. Orb damage grows while active up to double after 5 seconds.
citadel_ability_zealot_summon_spirits_t1: +{s:SpiritBulletArmor} Bullet Armor while there is a spirit active.
citadel_ability_zealot_summon_spirits_t3: +{s:SpiritLifeSteal}% Life Steal on Energy Spirit damage.
citadel_ability_zealot_tether_desc: Creates a beam of energy to a friend, with each hero sharing {s:TetheredShareStatsPct}% of their health regen, fire rate and spirit bonuses. Breaks if out of range for more than {s:TetherDisconnectTime} seconds. Upgrade bonuses apply to both Zealot and his tethered target.
citadel_ability_zealot_weapon_drain_puls: Drains the Courage of nearby enemy heroes and NPCs, reducing their gun damage. A portion of the stolen damage is transferred to Zealot's gun.
citadel_confirm_reset_crosshair: Are you sure you want to reset your crosshair to the defaults?
citadel_confirm_reset_keybindings: Are you sure you want to reset your keybindings (including hero specific keybinds) to default?
citadel_confirm_reset_keybindings_for_de: Are you sure you want to reset your default keybindings back to the default binds?
citadel_confirm_reset_keybindings_for_he: Are you sure you want to reset your keybindings for this hero to default?
citadel_hint_activate_wall: Press [{s:iv_attack}] to create the wall early.
citadel_hint_buy_items: Return to the base or a shop to buy mods.
citadel_hint_flying_strike_early_activat: Press [{s:iv_attack}] to fly to your target early.
citadel_hint_hero_testing_shop: Press [{s:citadel_open_hero_sheet}] to open up the shop and set test options.
citadel_hint_ladder: Press [{s:in_mantle}]+[{s:key_forward}] to jump onto the ladder.
citadel_hint_learn_ability: Hold down an ability key 1-4 to learn that ability.
citadel_hint_learn_initial_ability: Hold [{s:show_scoreboard}] to choose which ability to unlock.
citadel_hint_melee: Press [{s:in_weapon1}] to use your melee attack.
citadel_hint_slide: Hold [{s:duck}] while running down a ramp to slide.
citadel_hint_teleport: Your Tier2 boss is under attack, press [{s:key_teleport}] to teleport to help!
citadel_hint_zipline: Hold [{s:in_mantle}] to jump on the hyperline.
citadel_hint_zoom: Hold [{s:iv_attack2}] to zoom in with your weapon.
citadel_hotkeys_tooltip_chatvoiceparty: Use your microphone to communicate with all party members. If set to use open mic, this will also work in the dashboard.
citadel_hotkeys_tooltip_chatvoiceteam: Use your microphone to communicate with all team members.
citadel_replay_manager_error_chunk_faile: Replay not yet ready for download
citadel_replay_manager_error_write_failu: Replay failed to write to local disk
citadel_settings_ability_quickcast_toolt: Toggle to enable/disable quickcast for this specific ability/item
citadel_settings_alt_cast_double_tap_too: Double tap an ability button to alternate cast the ability
citadel_settings_alt_cast_key_tooltip: Alternate Cast an ability by selecting it then pressing the Alternate Cast button, or by holding the Alternate Cast button and then pressing an ability key
citadel_settings_alt_cast_press_and_hold: Hold an ability button for a short duration to alternate cast
citadel_settings_antialiasing_desc:
Post-process anti-aliasing effect to use when FSR2 is disabled.

Performance cost: small/consistent
citadel_settings_area_lights_desc:
Allows large or irregularly shaped light sources, such as beam effects, to be rendered correctly. Performance cost could be higher on low-end systems.

Performance cost: small/consistent
citadel_settings_cancel_ability_mode_abi: Cancel an active ability be pressing the Ability key again
citadel_settings_cancel_ability_mode_can: Cancel an active ability be pressing the Cancel Key
citadel_settings_cancel_ability_mode_eit: Cancel Key or the Ability Key
Cancel an active ability be pressing the Cancel Key or Ability key again
citadel_settings_chat_allow_global: Channel messages appear in other channel tabs
citadel_settings_chat_filter_allow_frien: Friendly players (friends, party members, and guild members)
citadel_settings_chat_filter_onlyfriends: Only show chat from friends, party, and guild
citadel_settings_chat_filter_settings_ap: Apply Allowed Chat Filter Settings to Spectating
citadel_settings_chat_join_regional: Join regional chat channel on startup
citadel_settings_depth_of_field_desc:
Simulates varying camera lens focal length and aperture. Should not affect gameplay performance in its current state.

Performance cost: negligible
citadel_settings_dfao_desc:
Approximates soft contact shadowing from characters and dynamic objects using distance field data.

Performance cost: moderate/varies
citadel_settings_displacement_mapping_de:
Screen space displacement effect for higher fidelity bumps on world geometry.

Performance cost: moderate/consistent
citadel_settings_distancefield_reflectio:
WIP feature using distance fields for specular occlusion. Performance degrades with more characters on screen but should improve in future updates.

Performance cost: heavy/varies
citadel_settings_distancefield_shadows_d:
Dynamic objects cast shadows in cheaper non-shadow mapped lights.

Performance cost: moderate/varies
citadel_settings_effects_bloom_desc:
Allows us to draw effects directly into the bloom buffer to enhanced visuals.

Performance cost: small/consistent
citadel_settings_enable_console_tooltip: If you have launch options like -dev or -console that enable the console they override this setting.
citadel_settings_fps_max_tip: Extended values can be provided with the +fps_max launch option."nValues out of range for the slider will disable the slider.
citadel_settings_fps_max_ui_tip: Extended values can be provided with the +ui_fps_max launch option."nValues out of range for the slider will disable the slider.
citadel_settings_fsr2_desc: WIP Integration of AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution 2 Temporal AA/Upscaling
citadel_settings_fsr2scaling_desc:
Native AA - 1x scaling
Quality - 1.5x scaling
Balanced - 1.7x scaling
Performance - 2x scaling
Ultra Performance - 3x scaling

Performance cost: heavy/consistent
citadel_settings_fsr_tooltip: High quality upscaling when game render screen quality is less than 100%."nRequires Anti-Aliasing enabled.
citadel_settings_fxaa_desc:
Reduces stair-stepping artifacts from undersampling the image. Antialiasing is WIP - we currently support FXAA.

Performance cost: small/consistent
citadel_settings_gamevoicevolume_desc: Controls the input volume of your microphone
citadel_settings_gamevolume_desc: Adjusts the volume of sound effects, music, and dialog
citadel_settings_invert_ping_desc: Check to invert pings. "nDefaults: "nSingle Ping = Passive. "nDouble Ping = Aggressive "n "nInverted: "nSingle Ping = Aggressive "nDouble Ping = Passive
citadel_settings_language_change_body: Restart the Deadlock client to apply language changes.
citadel_settings_light_sensitivity_mode_: This setting will reduce flashing and strobing effects, but it won’t completely eliminate them. It aims to make gameplay more comfortable, but some effects may still be present.
citadel_settings_low_latency_tooltip_boo: Low Latency mode is now enabled and optimizes system latency. Includes techniques that may draw more power to the GPU and slightly impact FPS to reduce latency as much as possible.
citadel_settings_low_latency_tooltip_on: Low Latency mode is now enabled and optimizes system latency.
citadel_settings_mastervolume_desc: Adjusts the overall volume of the game
citadel_settings_mboit_desc: WIP feature allowing effects to render more consistently, and eventually at lower resolution than the rest of the frame.
citadel_settings_monitor_mic_desc: Turn this on to listen to your microphone while adjusting voice settings.
citadel_settings_musicvolume_desc: Adjusts the volume of the music in the main menu
citadel_settings_openmicthreshold_desc: Only transmit voice when audio input volume is above this level. Applies to Push To Talk and Open Mic.
citadel_settings_particlequality_desc: Cull unnecessary parts of effects for better performance. Not currently used.
citadel_settings_ping_wheel_contextual_d: Contextual Slot is changed during gameplay based on the current context
citadel_settings_post_bloom_desc:
Bleeds light from brighter parts of the image to simulate imperfections in camera lenses, to give a visual cue for high brightness.

Performance cost: small/consistent
citadel_settings_quick_cast_global_desc: Change Quick Cast Mode for all hero abilities:
citadel_settings_quick_cast_set_success: Quick Cast Mode for all hero abilities set successfully.
citadel_settings_renderquality_desc: Per-dimension scaling ratio for calculating internal render resolution. Lower values render faster. Higher values render sharper with fewer artifacts.
citadel_settings_ssao_desc:
Approximates soft contact shadowing using screen space data.

Performance cost: moderate/consistent.
citadel_settings_streamer_mode_tooltip: Turn this on to hide player names in-game and on the dashboard. Does not hide player names from Profile Cards.
citadel_settings_streamlined_mic_desc: Open the recording device when the game is started, instead of when the mic is used.
citadel_settings_texturequality_desc: Lower settings reduce texture resolution to possibly improve performance on lower-end systems.
citadel_settings_upscaling_desc:
Generates high resolution frames from low resolution, faster-to-render internal frames.

FSR2 uses temporal anti-aliasing (TAA).

Performance cost: moderate/consistent
citadel_settings_voice_steam_link: Recording device settings are configured using Steam voice settings.
citadel_settings_voicevolume_desc: Adjust the volume of other players' microphones
citadel_settings_vsync_desc: Eliminates screen tearing artifacts but increases input latency.
citadel_survey_fun_hero: How fun was the hero you played today?
citadel_survey_least_fun_hero_to_play_ag: Which hero was the least fun to play against?
citadel_trick_shot_desc: Toss a Shooting Star that will fire slowing bullets at nearby enemies.  Shoot the Star to increase its fire rate (Enemies can shoot it to slow it down).  Weapon upgrades apply to Shooting Star.
citadel_weapon_hero_atlas_set_desc: Reloads single shells at a time. Can be interrupted
citadel_weapon_hero_bebop_set_desc: Fires a continuous beam with no bullet travel
citadel_weapon_hero_cadence_set_desc: Shoots bursts of 4 bullets that embed a crystal shard in the target. After 1 second, the shards shatter and deal the bullet damage again. Shatter damage is doubled if 5 or more shards are embedded.
citadel_weapon_hero_forge_set_desc: Increases fire rate as the guns spins up
citadel_weapon_hero_slork_set_desc: Spews a short range toxic cloud that deals double damage to non-hero targets. When aimed, shoots a long range dart that poisons enemies.
clawdril_cyclone_desc: Clawdril sticks the drill in the ground, lifts his body horizontally, and spins it up. Kicks everyone nearby in the face while creating a vortex that sucks enemies inwards and deflects bullets.
clawdril_drill_and_pin_desc: Fire Clawdril's dril in a straight line, trapping any enemy hero it hits in a cage of crystals.
clawdril_mining_expedition_desc: Smash the ground to reveal nearby crystals which can be melee'd into temporary buffs by you or your teammates.
clawdril_plasma_laser_desc: Fire a short-range plasma laser that deals massive damage to units in its way.
coldmetal_charged_rocket_desc: Hold to charge then fire a rocket that travels faster the longer it's charged. Upon impact explodes into a burst of tactical heat-seeking missiles.
coldmetal_cold_metal_killer_desc: Launch a fan of knives in a cone in front of Cold Metal, slowing enemies upon impact.
coldmetal_contract_to_kill_desc: Take out a contract on a target hero for a duration. The contract takes extra bullet damage and extra damage from Cold Metal's missiles. You have no move speed penalty while shooting at the contract and no aim speed penalty at the contract while moving.
coldmetal_impenetrable_cube_desc: Fold up into an impenetrable cube for a duration, unable to shoot or take damage, then explode into a flurry of tactical heat-seaking missiles.
guide_advanced_parry_desc:
Press [ {s:key_parry} ] to parry an enemy's melee attack.

They will be stunned and will receive increased melee damage.
guide_basics_abilities_desc: Press [ {s:in_ability1}, {s:in_ability2}, {s:in_ability3}, {s:in_ability4} ] to use your hero's abilities.
guide_basics_aim_desc: Hold [ {s:iv_attack2} ] to zoom in with your weapon.
guide_basics_melee_desc: Press [ {s:key_weapon_1} ] to make a quick attack. Hold [ {s:key_weapon_1} ] to deliver a powerful charging attack.
guide_basics_reload_desc: Press [ {s:key_reload} ] to reload your weapon. Certain actions, such as melee, will pause reload.
guide_basics_shoot_desc:
Press [ {s:iv_attack} ] to shoot.

Gun damage falls off at longer ranges.
guide_movement_airdash_desc:
While airborne, dash to perform an air dash.

Requires stamina.
guide_movement_dodge_desc:
While moving press [ {s:key_innate_1} ] to dash.

Requires stamina.
guide_movement_dodge_jump_desc:
Combine a dash and a well-timed jump to perform a dash jump.

Requires stamina.
guide_movement_double_jump_desc:
Press [ {s:in_mantle} ] at the top of a jump to double jump.

Special moves like double jump use your stamina bar, located next to your reticle.
guide_movement_mantle_desc: Hold [ {s:in_mantle} ] when near a ledge to mantle up.
guide_movement_slide_desc: Hold [ {s:key_duck} ] to slide while moving down a ramp or moving at high speed.
guide_movement_zipline_desc:
Hold [ {s:in_mantle} ] to get on the line.

You can jump off by pressing [ {s:in_mantle} ].
guide_neutrals_desc:
There are many neutral creatures lurking around the map. Defeat them to earn souls.

Sometimes, a powerful creature will appear at the center of the map… defeating it will offer your team great power.
guide_overview_desc: Explore the various sections to learn about the game.
guide_the_map_core_alt_desc: Your goal is to siege the enemy base, and destroy their defenses to reveal their team's Patron.  Destroy the Patron, and victory is yours.
guide_the_map_core_desc: There is a shrine at the back of each team's base. Destroying the enemy shrine wins the game.
guide_the_map_desc: Hover over areas on the map to learn more about the things you'll see while playing Deadlock.
guide_the_map_guardians_desc: Guardians are the first line of defense in each lane. Their attacks are very powerful, so it's best to push into them with your troopers.
guide_the_map_lanes_desc: There are four lanes, each with a transit line that players can ride to move quickly.
guide_the_map_midboss_desc: The middle of the map has a powerful neutral boss. The team that kills it will have immediate respawns on their next deaths.
guide_the_map_troopers_desc: Troopers periodically spawn in the base and then run down a lane, fighting any enemies they encounter.
guide_the_map_walkers_desc: Walkers lie deeper in the lanes and have an arsenal of defensive moves.
guide_the_map_welcome_desc: Welcome to The Cursed Apple. If your team wants to emerge victorious, you’ll need to wield both guns and supernatural powers to lay siege to the enemy base.
guide_upgrades_buy_mods_desc:
Items can modify a variety of things like ammo count, melee damage or health regeneration. Items that increase Spirit Power improve the effectiveness of your abilities.

There is a Suggested Items tab with hand-picked recommendations for each hero.
guide_upgrades_deny_desc:
Enemy Soul Orbs are orange and enemies will get them if they float away or if they shoot them.

You can shoot these Orange Orbs first to steal them.
guide_upgrades_going_home_desc:
When you have souls to spend, go back to base to heal and buy powerful items that increase your stats and grant additional abilities.

There's also a shop next to each guardian, available until the guardian is destroyed.
guide_upgrades_killing_guardians_desc:
As you collect souls, you'll also be granted Ability Points (AP).

You can spend these points to upgrade your abilities by holding [TAB].
guide_upgrades_last_hit_desc:
Get Souls by killing troopers and players. You can also get Souls by killing neutrals located throughout the map.

Souls are shared among allies nearby.
guide_upgrades_upgrade_abilities_desc:
Spend Ability Points to upgrade your abilities.

Abilities have three upgrade tiers.
guide_upgrades_yellow_orbs_desc:
When you land a killing blow, extra Souls appear.

You can secure these Souls by shooting the blue orb containing them or letting them float away.
gunslinger_rapid_fire_desc: Rapidly fire your guns at a target with perfect accuracy and 50% increased damage for {s:AbilityChannelTime}s.  Causes {s:hero_name} and the target to float if in the air.
gunslinger_rocket_launcher_desc: Equip a rocket launcher that fires explosive rockets.  Rocket blasts can launch enemies and {s:hero_name} into the air.
gunslinger_sleep_bomb_desc: Throw out a sleep bomb that explodes on impact, creating an expanding cloud that sleeps enemies it touches.
gunslinger_tenacity_desc: Gain {s:BulletLifestealPercent}% bullet life steal, increased by up to {s:LowHealthHealingScalePercent}% based on {s:hero_name}'s missing health.
hero_akimbo_lore: Though he was built by a lonely gunslinger, Akimbo was taught that he couldn't use a gun to solve all his problems.  This frustrated the robot outlaw immensely, but as time passed Akimbo realized that his human father was right.  A gun only solved about 75% of his problems.  To solve ALL his problems, he would need at least 2 guns.
